tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_schedule_id FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES maintenance_schedule(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
   schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_id INT,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceActivity (
   activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   schedule_id INT,
   activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   activity_date DATE,
   description TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceSchedule(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   activity_id INT,
   log_date DATE,
   technician_id INT,
   status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   notes TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceActivity(activity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_notes TEXT,
  technician_name VARCHAR(100)
);
